name: Dali's Tower
description:
Dali's tower is a game meant to reproduce a world of illusion in which you'll be doing parkour in a platform game. Doing so, you'll have a panoply of ways to move across the map. Your character will be able to jump, to move on the platforms, to slow and to accelerate time. Ugo, your character, is actually dreaming about Dali's paintings. Reaching the top of the tower is the only way for Ugo to wake up. 

This game was created during the PolyGames Creative Jam 19th edition.

The 3d models used in this game where dowloaded from free packages in the unreal marketplace.

-----commands-----

move : wasd keys
jump : spacebar
slow down time : 1
accelerate time : 2
escape : quit game
